CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 28, 1946, pg. 15, reads: 'Christmas Gift' - Children of the Vann School Junior Red Cross are pictured as they [illegible] gifts for children of the Davis Home on Simonton Street.  The young people made the gifts for Christmas contributions to these less fortunate than themselves."
TitMainTitle: Two women, including teacher Florine Robinson, and seven girls from Vann School holding presents for children at Davis Home, in interior with Christmas tree and poster reading "Help Santa give to the..."
